svg.aria-label: Public inputs vs witness: what is public and what is private

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif
-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif

svg.text: The proof “binds” both: the verifier sees public inputs + proof, but is convinced some private witness satisfies the constraints.
